about_the_game:
"Is it possible that, having lost my job in middle age, I will never find love again?..."

After losing my job in middle age, I was alone and feeling down at home one day when an old man paid me a strange visit and invited me to participate in an experiment?

"This seems too suspicious, right?"

But honestly, what do I have to lose now? So I dragged my heavy steps to the place the old man mentioned and slowly pushed open the door...

"Welcome to the Love Quiz Battle!"

【Game Features】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Diverse and Unique Beauties
    Gentle chefs, tsundere lab assistants, assertive teachers, and lively athletes—various styles and personalities for you to experience different kinds of beauties.

  • Using Both Heads?
    While increasing your knowledge, you can also satisfy your desires? What kind of new gameplay can such a strong collision create?

  • Relive the Good Old Days
    Good times may pass, but they can come back! You can always revisit those delicious memories you gained after battles.

  • Over 150 Choices!
    Only by breaking through numerous choices can you break through the beauties' defenses. Can you find the route to the end?

  • Full Mouse Support for One-Handed Operation
    You need to use both heads! You know what I mean~

【Gameplay Instructions】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣


  • Game Objective: Choose a question set and answer the questions. You must not get more than two wrong out of ten questions to pass!

  • Two-Choice Gameplay: Choose the correct answer between two options.

  • Four-Choice Gameplay: Choose the correct answer among four options.

  • Timed Four-Choice: Within the time limit, choose the correct answer among four options.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked , sexual acts or pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old
